Name: Ogre Tomahawk
Properties: Unique Passive Angry: Basic attacks will increase hero's movement speed 10%.

Name: Magic Blade
Properties: Unique Passive Lifeline: Gains a shield that can absorb 280~700 damage (increase with level) when HP is below 30%. Cooldown 30s.

Name: Demon Hunter Sword
Properties: Unique Passive Devour: Basic attacks will deal 10% of the target's current HP as additional physical damage (up to 60 against monsters).
Unique Passive Devour: Each basic attack grants 4% health stealing for 4s, up to 3 times.

Name: Deadly Blade
Properties: Unique Passive Life Drain: Basic attack reduces HP regen effect by 50% for 3s

Name: Corrosion Scythe
Properties: Unique Passive Corrosion: Basic attacks lower the target's attack speed by 10% and have a 50% chance to reduce the target's movement speed by 35%
Unique Passive Impulse: Dealing damage with basic attacks increase your physical attack by 2%, up to a maximum of 6%. Lasts for 3s.

Name: Malefic Roar
Properties: Unique Passive Armor Buster: Basic attack will ignore 20% of a defense turret's defensive armor.

Name: Haas's Claw
Properties: Unique Passive Insanity: When HP drops below 40%, the hero will receive an extra 10% physical lifesteal

Name: Berserker's Fury
Properties: Unique Passive Doom: Crit strikes will increase one's physical attack 5%, lasting 2s

Name: Endless Battle
Properties: Unique Passive Divine Justice: After using an ability, the next basic attack will deal additional 70% of physical attack as true damage, 1.5s cooldown.
Unique Passive Chase Fate: When Divine Justice's effect is triggered, it will increase the hero's movement speed by 15%

Name: WindTalker
Properties: Unique Passive Typhoon: After every 4 basic attacks, the next basic attack will deal 125 magic damage to 3 enemies
Unique Passive Activate: Each time Typhoon is cast, one's movement speed will be increased bt 5% for a short time

Name: Scarlet Phantom
Properties: Unique Passive Frenzy: Crit strikes will increase the hero's attack speed 25% and crit strike rate 5% lasting 2s.

Name: Blade of the 7 Seas
Properties: Unique Passive Steamroll: Skills will lower the target's physical defence by 25 points (applied before damage), Lasts for 3s

Name: Blade of Despair
Properties: Unique Passive Despair: Deals an extra 10% damage to an enemy in an abnormal state (stunned, knocked, airborne, transformed, disabled).

Name: Hunter Strike
Properties: Unique Passive Hunt: Attacks enemy 5 times in a row and improves the hero's movement speed by 30% for 2s, cooldown 15s.

Name: Bloodlust Axe
Properties: Unique Passive BloodThirsty: When skills cause damage, heals 20% of damage as HP for the hero (spell vamp).

Name: Rose Gold Meteor
Properties: Unique Passive Lifeline: Gains a shield that can absorb 510~1350 damage (increase with level) when HP is below 30%, with 30s CD

Name: Azure Blade
Properties: Unique Passive Judgement: After using a skill, the next basic attack deals 50 extra true damage with a cooldown of 1.5s.

Name: Elegant Gem
Properties: Unique Passive Gift: Regens 20% HP and Mana within 2s of leveling up.

Name: Enchanted Talisman
Properties: Unique Passive Mana Spring: Regen 10% total of one's max Mana every 10s

Name: Winter Truncheon
Properties: Unique Passive Frozen: When own hero's HP drops below 30%, being hit by basic attack will lower target's movement speed by 80% and deal 50% of magic power as magic damage to the target. This effect has a 5s cooldown.

Name: Feather of Heaven
Properties: Unique Passive Affliction: Basic attacks will deal 40% of the hero's AP as additional magic damage.
Unique Passive Derive: Increases Spell Vamp effect by additional 8%

Name: Disaster Truncheon
Properties: Unique Passive The Dead: When skills cause damage to target, will reduce 25 pts of magic resistance for the target, lasting 5s.

Name: Necklace of Durance
Properties: Unique Passive Life Drain: Skill dealing damage to the target reduces the regen effect by 50% for 3s.

Name: Devil Tears
Properties: Unique Passive Spellbreaker: When HP is higher than 70%, the unique bonus effect is increased by 30%

Name: Holy Crystal
Properties: Unique Passive Exterminate: After a skill hits a target, magic attack will immediately increase 15%. The next skill damage will terminate this effect. This effect can last up to 3s with a built in cooldown time of 10s

Name: Concentrated Energy
Properties: Unique Passive Recharge: Regen 10% of one's HP after killing a hero.

Name: Ice Queen Wand
Properties: Unique Passive Ice Bound: Skills that damage an enemy hero will carry a 15% slow down effect. This effect lasts 3s and can stack up to 2 times.

Name: Glowing Wand
Properties: Unique Passive Scorch: Burns the target for 3s when the skills hit, deaing 2% / 2.5% / 3% of the target's current HP as magic damage, at least 10 pts

Name: Calamity Reaper
Properties: Unique Passive Calamity: After using a skill, the next basic attack deals extra true damage equal to 120% magic attack with a cooldown of 1.5s.

Name: Clock of Destiny
Properties: Unique Passive Time: Adds 30 HP and 5 Magic attack every 30s. Up to 10 times
Unique Passive Reincarnate. If Time is fully stacked, then the hero will receive 5% magic attack and 300 mana

Name: Blood Wings
Properties: Unique Passive Nirvana: Adds 2 HP for every 1 pt of magic power added.

Name: Fleeting Time
Properties: Unique Passive Timestream: After killing an enemy hero, immediately reduces 20% of current reuse time for all abilites

Name: Lightning Truncheon
Properties: Unique Passive Resonate: Every 6s, your next damaging magical ability will proc, maximum of 3 enemies will be hurt by 150% magic power damage.

Name: Molten Essence
Properties: Unique Passive Burning Soul: deals 1% of one's Max HP as magic damage per second to nearby enemies, and deals extra 50% damage to minions.

Name: Dreadnaught Armor
Properties: Unique Passive Deter: When an enemy hero attacks, this ability will reduce his/her attack power by 4%. This effect lasts 2s and can stack up to 3 times.

Name: Courage Bulwark
Properties: Unique Passive Bravery: Increases 10% of attack power and defense for nearby allies.
Unique Passive Heavy Armor: Nearby soldiers can take more defense turret damage.

Name: Blade Armor
Properties: Unique Passive Counterstrike: Deals 25% of opponent's physical attack as physical damage to an attacker when a basic attack is received.

Name: Wings of Apocalypse Queen
Properties: Unique Passive Demonize: Increases physical and magic defense 40% and physical lifesteal by 15% when HP drops below 40%.

Name: Thunder Belt
Properties: Unique Passive Thunderbolt: After you use a skill, the next basic attack will carry an extra 40% of physical attacks as true damage, and slow the target and surrounding enemy units, lasts 1.5s. Effect can only be used once every 1.5sconds.

Name: Cursed Helmet
Properties: Unique Passive Burning Soul: Deals 1.5% of one's max HP as magic damage per second to nearby enemies, and deals extra 50% damage to minions.

Name: Bloodthirsty King
Properties: Unique Passive Bloodthirst: A kill or assist regens 20% of hero's HP within 5s. 10s cooldown.

Name: Demon's Advent
Properties: Unique Passive Deter: When an enemy hero attacks, this ability will reduce his/her attack power by 6%. This effect lasts 2s and can stack up to 3 times.

Name: Oracle
Properties: Unique Passive Scream: Within 4s after being attacked, the hero will regen 8% HP. This effect has a 6s cooldown time.

Name: Athena's Shield
Properties: Unique Passive Shield: Get a damage-absorbing shield every 30s, Shield absorption amount grows as the match goes on, maxing out at 1150.

Name: Dominance Ice
Properties: Unique Passive Arctic Cold: Lowers movement speed 5% and lowers attack speed 30% for nearby enemy heroes.

Name: Immortality
Properties: Unique Passive Immortal: Resurrect 2s after dying and get 15% HP and a shield that can absorb 300~1000 pts of damage. Shield lasts for 3s. Cooldown for this effect is 180s.

Name: Brute Force Breastplate
Properties: Unique Passive Brute Force: Attacking an enemy will increase one's capabilites, increasing movement speed by 2% and physical attack by 3%. This effect last 4s and can stack up to 4 times.

Name: Ancient Ghostatue
Properties: Unique Passive Runner: On leaving combat movement speed will increase by 60

Name: Warrior Boots
Properties: Unique Passive Valor: Physical defense will go up by 5 with each basic attack received, for an increase of up to 25 points, lasting 3s.

Name: Tough Boots
Properties: Unique Passive Fortitude: Reduces time controlled 25%

Name: Wizard Boots
Properties: Unique Passive Plunder: 80 gold will be awaded for assists.

Name: Boots of Tranquility
Properties: Unique Passive Bless: HP regen effect increased by 10%

Name: Hunter's Knife
Properties: Unique Passive Greed: Get Extra 15% exp when jungling

Name: Curse Sword
Properties: Unique Passive Greed: Get an extra 30% exp when jungling. Regain 4% of maximum health and 10% of mana after monster kill.
Unique passive Gorge: Increases damage by 0.5% on killing a jungle monster, stacking up to 2 times.

Unique Passive: Makes the battle spell retribution applicable to heroes: Reduces target's movement speed 70% (The effect will decay within 3s) and reduces target's Magic Resistance. Buying other advanced jungle gear will disable this effect.

Name: Pillager Axe
Properties: Unique Passive Greed: Get an extra 30% exp when jungling. Regain 4% of maximum health and 10% of mana after monster kill.
Unique passive Gorge: Slaying jungle monster increases one's physical and magical defense by 3 up to 10 times.

Unique Passive: Makes the battle spell retribution applicable to heroes: Reduces target's movement speed by 70% (The effect will decay within 3s) and within a short period of time receive a shield that scales off maximum health. Buying other advance jungle gear will disable this effect.

Properties: Unique Passive Greed: Get an extra 30% exp when jungling. Regain 4% of maximum health and 10% of mana after monster kill.
Unique passive Gorge: Slaying Jungle monster increases your physical attack by 4. Stacks up to 10 times.

Unique Passive: Makes the battle spell retribution applicable to heroes: Reduces target's movement speed by 70% (The effect will decay within 3s) and reduces target's Magic Resistance. Buying other advance jungle gear will disable this effect.

Unique Passive: Makes the battle spell retribution applicable to heroes: Reduces target's movement speed 70% (The effect will decay within 3s) and reduces target's Magic Resistance. Buying other advanced jungle gear will disable this effect.

Unique passive Gorge: Slaying jungle monster increases one's physical and magical defense by 3 up to 10 times.

Unique Passive: Makes the battle spell retribution applicable to heroes: Reduces target's movement speed by 70% (The effect will decay within 3s) and within a short period of time receive a shield that scales off maximum health. Buying other advance jungle gear will disable this effect.

Properties: Unique Passive Greed: Get an extra 30% exp when jungling. Regain 4% of maximum health and 10% of mana after monster kill.
Unique passive Gorge: Slaying Jungle monster increases your physical attack by 4. Stacks up to 10 times.
